document.full_text: persistent federal reserve critic representative ron paul plans to hold a hearing on the central bank's emergency loans to the branches of non-u.s. banks, and could ask a fed official to testify, his spokeswoman said on saturday.
document.title: rep. paul planning hearing on fed foreign lending
lines_and_colors: persistent federal reserve critic representative ron paul plans to hold a hearing on the central bank's emergency loans to the branches of non-u.s. banks, and could ask a fed official to testify, his spokeswoman said on saturday.
